1.text:
{{1.name}}: this is a one person prompt.
{{1.name % upper}}: THIS IS MY NAME, BUT UPPERCASE.
{{1.name}}: the first character of my name is {{1.name % first}}.
{{1.name}}: hello! i am {{1.name}}, and my pronouns are {{1.pronouns.subjectPn}}/{{1.pronouns.objectPn}}!
{{1.name}}: hello! testing a thing. {{1.plural ? true : false % upper}}

2.text:
{{1.name}}: hello, my name is {{1.name}}. my pronouns are {{1.pronouns.subjectPn}}/{{1.pronouns.objectPn}}.
{{2.name}}: that's rad. you can call me {{2.name}}, i use {{2.pronouns.subjectPn}}/{{2.pronouns.objectPn}}.

{{1.name}}: I AM CURRENTLY EATING!!!
{{2.name}}: {{1.pronouns.subjectPn % upper}} {{1.plural ? are : is % upper}} CURRENTLY EATING!!!!!
